deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all of your data from our servers.
deleteAccount.confirmPrompt: To confirm, please type "{confirmationText}" in the box below.

success.title: Account deleted
success.description: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted.

error.title: Deletion failed
error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

feedback.title: Send us your feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear what you think about Nutrack9.

success.title: Feedback sent!
success.description: Thank you for helping us improve.

welcome.title: Unlock the Connection Between Food and Mood
welcome.subtitle: Nutrack9 is a simple, mindful tool to help you discover how your diet affects your well-being. Track your meals and moods to find patterns and feel your best.

nutrition.title: Track Your Nutrition
nutrition.description: Effortlessly log the foods you eat each day. Our smart suggestion tool makes it fast and simple.

mood.title: Understand Your Mood
mood.description: Quickly record your mood throughout the day to see how your emotional state fluctuates.

connections.title: Discover Connections
connections.description: Our calendar view helps you visualize the relationship between what you ate and how you felt.

dashboard.welcomeDescription: Here's an overview of your journey with Nutrack9.
dashboard.logOneMoreDay: Log at least one more day to see your progress chart.
dashboard.noLogsYet: You haven't logged any food yet. Go to the Tracking page to start your first log and see your progress here!
dashboard.getPersonalizedDescription: Fill out your personal information to unlock daily nutritional goals tailored just for you.
dashboard.getPersonalizedContent: By providing your height, weight, age, gender, and activity level, we can estimate your daily calorie and macronutrient needs to help you reach your goals.

a2hs.title: Get Quick Access
a2hs.description: Add Nutrack9 to your home screen for a faster, app-like experience.

ios.step2: Scroll down and select 'Add to Home Screen'

recommendedIntake.title: Recommended Daily Intake
recommendedIntake.description: Based on your information, here are your estimated daily nutritional goals.
recommendedIntake.infoPopover: These are estimated ranges based on the Mifflin-St Jeor formula for BMR and standard activity multipliers. Your individual needs may vary.

aggregatedFoodLogs.title: Recent Foods
aggregatedFoodLogs.description: A summary of the foods you've logged in the last 9 days.
aggregatedFoodLogs.noRecentFoods: No foods logged in the last 9 days.

intakeChart.title: Nutrient Intake Analysis
intakeChart.description: Your daily intake versus your recommended range over time.

dailyTracker.description: Log your food and mood for the day.
dailyTracker.loginPrompt: Please log in to track your food and mood.
dailyTracker.noFoodLogged: No food logged for this day yet.

feedbackDialog.title: Send us your feedback
feedbackDialog.description: We'd love to hear what you think about Nutrack9.

success.title: Feedback sent!
success.description: Thank you for helping us improve.

premium.title: Choose Your Plan
premium.subtitle: Unlock powerful features to supercharge your health journey.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon!
comingSoon.description: We're working hard to bring you exciting new features. Premium plans will be available shortly. Stay tuned!

features: All features from the Monthly plan

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and application settings.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Provide this information to get personalized daily nutritional recommendations.

profileUpdated.title: Profile updated
profileUpdated.description: Your information has been saved successfully.

profileCleared.title: Profile cleared
profileCleared.description: Your personal information has been removed.
